alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:59PM EDT until July 13 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... West central Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... Northwestern Williamsburg County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 259 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Hope, or near Lake City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Lake City, Pamplico, Mars Bluff, Cades, Poston, Gresham, Hebron, New Hope, Sardis, Hyman, Hannah, Effingham, Francis Marion University, Friendfield, Claussen, Evergreen, Kingsburg, Brittons Neck and Scranton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
